descriptions: Focuses on allergies and disorders of the immune system.
Deals with diseases and conditions of the heart and cardiovascular system.
Studies the effects of drugs and medications on the body and specializes in their clinical use.
Provides psychological assessments and therapy for mental health conditions.
Specializes in skin, hair, and nail disorders.
Provides immediate medical care in emergency situations.
Deals with hormonal disorders and diseases of the endocrine system.
Treats disorders related to the ear, nose, and throat.
Investigates and determines the cause of death in legal and criminal cases.
Specializes in the digestive system, including the stomach and intestines.
Provides primary care for patients of all ages.
Specializes in the care of elderly patients and age-related health issues.
Specializes in women's reproductive health, pregnancy, and childbirth.
Deals with diseases related to the blood and blood-forming tissues.
Specializes in studying and controlling the spread of infectious diseases within populations.
Specializes in infectious diseases caused by bacteria, viruses, fungi, or parasites.
Manages critically ill patients in intensive care units (ICUs).
Specializes in adult medicine, managing a wide range of diseases and conditions.
Uses imaging technology to perform minimally invasive procedures for diagnosis and treatment.
Focuses on the study and management of genetic disorders.
Studies microorganisms and their effects on human health.
Specializes in kidney diseases and disorders.
Focuses on disorders of the nervous system, including the brain and spinal cord.
Utilizes radioactive substances for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes.
Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.
Specializes in eye and vision care.
Deals with musculoskeletal system issues, including bones, joints, ligaments, and tendons.
Focuses on managing and alleviating chronic pain conditions.
Provides care for patients with serious or terminal illnesses, focusing on comfort and quality of life.
Focuses on the healthcare of infants, children, and adolescents.
Specializes in the physical restoration and rehabilitation of patients with disabilities.
Specializes in mental health and treats psychiatric disorders.
Specializes in diseases of the respiratory system, including the lungs.
Specializes in fertility issues and reproductive endocrinology.
Focuses on autoimmune and inflammatory diseases affecting joints and soft tissues.
Deals with sleep disorders and conditions affecting sleep.
Specializes in the treatment and prevention of sports-related injuries.
Performs organ transplantation surgeries.
Deals with the urinary system and male reproductive organs.
Focuses on the surgical treatment of vascular (blood vessel) conditions.
